about.description:
Xpublish lets you serve, share and publish Xarray Datasets via a web application.
The data and/or metadata in the Xarray Datasets can be exposed in various forms
through pluggable REST API endpoints. Efficient, on-demand delivery of large
datasets may be enabled with Dask on the server-side.
about.summary: Publish Xarray Datasets via a Zarr compatible REST API

about.description:
Xpublish lets you serve, share and publish Xarray Datasets via a web application.
The data and/or metadata in the Xarray Datasets can be exposed in various forms
through pluggable REST API endpoints. Efficient, on-demand delivery of large
datasets may be enabled with Dask on the server-side.
about.summary: Publish Xarray Datasets via a Zarr compatible REST API

name: xpublish
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xpublish" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: da221ef83c51d660c13f95883121f1b82d39b3d7e83c7d2c46cf9f6e4edd372b

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.8
    - pip
    - setuptools >=42
    - setuptools-scm >=3.4
  run:
    - python >=3.8
    - cachey
    - dask
    - fastapi >=0.59
    - numcodecs
    - numpy >=1.17
    - toolz
    - uvicorn
    - xarray >=0.16
    - zarr

test:
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check
  imports:
    - xpublish

about:
  home: https://xpublish.readthedocs.io
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Publish Xarray Datasets via a Zarr compatible REST API
  description: |
    Xpublish lets you serve, share and publish Xarray Datasets via a web application.
    The data and/or metadata in the Xarray Datasets can be exposed in various forms
    through pluggable REST API endpoints. Efficient, on-demand delivery of large
    datasets may be enabled with Dask on the server-side.
  doc_url: https://xpublish.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/xarray-contrib/xpublish
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jhamman
    - andersy005
